info.colony4cc.rgb_charge: The RGB Charge acts as fuel for the hologram projection system in Colony Peripherals.  One is consumed when activating a holographic overlay on a building.
info.colony4cc.upgrade_merging:
Sticking these two peripherals together gives you an item that can be installed in a pocket computer to give you the features of both.

If you sneak-right-click the item in the air, you will tear them apart into the original two component peripherals.  The glue doesn't survive, however.
